Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Scarab
Description: Brick-red, uninscribed enamel scarab with visible elytra and a well-defined head, although not rendered as nicely as other specimens. Nonetheless nicely manufactured, the flat surface is polished but bears no inscription.
